Elita:

Elita blinked when she heard that, "Lord Elder"said the little one =

ween? We can transform... why are they asking a holo... holo that thing?"

aphic field on me. As far as Hydras knows, Night Shift has mutilated me to =
the point of irecognizable proportions. I need a hologram of me in a disman=

ked field. Tucson out."

Lord Elder get's a confused look on his face, "He =
wants a holographic
projection?" He looked over at Elita for a moment and t=
hen back at the
terminal in front of him. "He didn't mention that in the pl=
anning
stages. If we could do that we could have hidden the Ark with it."
E=
lder grumbled under his breath. "it's not as if Mirage or Hound are
standin=
g here at my back."

Reopening the communication link Elder spoke, "We don'=
t have a
projector. Maybe try landing in mid transformation? It may look
co=
nvincing if they don't look hard enough." He shook his head tiredly
as he w=
aited for a response.

(TAG)

OOC: By the way, where is this taking place? =
Right outside the Ark,

n't quite sure. I
